General.Name: Oceana
General.Description: Oceana Group Limited operates as a fishing company in South Africa, Namibia, rest of Africa, North America, Europe, the Far East, and internationally. It engages in catching, processing, and procuring various marine species, including pilchard, anchovy, redeye herring, Gulf menhaden, tuna, lobster, squid, horse mackerel, and hake. The company also markets and sells canned fish, fishmeal, and fish oil. In addition, it provides refrigerated warehouse facilities for cold storage, and logistical support services. The company was incorporated in 1918 and is headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa.
General.Address: Oceana House, Cape Town, South Africa, 8001
